subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Either cognate to {{och-l|英}} "bright" or rather its Austroasiatic comparanda, or connected with {{och-l|苑}} "shady"

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=yǐng,er=y
|m_note=yǐngr - “shadow; reflection; vague impression”
|c=jing2,jeng2
|g=in3
|h=pfs=yáng
|j=ing2
|md=īng
|mn=iáⁿ/ńg/éng
|mn_note=iáⁿ - vernacular; ńg - vernacular (limited, e.g. {{zh-l|樹影|tr=-}}); éng - literary
|mn-t=ian2
|w=2in
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=
|cat=n,c:v

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[shadow]]
# [[image]]
# [[trace]] (of human presence); [[presence]] (of people or things); [[occurrence]] (of events)
# [[picture]]; [[photograph]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[take]] (a picture)

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かが}}

# [[light]]
# a shape or form reflected in light
# a [[shadow]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|かげ|yomi=k}}
{{suffix|ja|影|tr1=kaga|い|tr2=i}} > kage. Bound apophonic form of {{m|ja|影|tr=kaga}}.
